name: donantes-pwa
description: Donantes PWA - Aplicación para donación de artículos

scripts.copyfiles: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path dist,dist\assets,dist\js,dist\config,dist\services,dist\utils,dist\styles,dist\pages > $null; if (Test-Path public) { Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path public\* -Destination dist } ; if (Test-Path assets) { Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path assets -Destination dist } ; if (Test-Path js) { Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path js -Destination dist } ; if (Test-Path config) { Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path config -Destination dist } ; if (Test-Path services) { Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path services -Destination dist } ; if (Test-Path utils) { Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path utils -Destination dist } ; if (Test-Path styles) { Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path styles -Destination dist } ; if (Test-Path pages) { Get-ChildItem -Path pages -Filter *.html | ForEach-Object { Copy-Item -Force $_.FullName -Destination dist\pages } } ; if (Test-Path sw.js) { Copy-Item -Force sw.js dist } }"
scripts.build:docker: rimraf dist && vite build && mkdir -p dist/public dist/assets dist/js dist/config dist/services dist/utils dist/styles dist/pages && cp -r public/* dist/public/ && cp -r assets dist/ && cp -r js dist/ && cp -r config dist/ && [ -d services ] && cp -r services dist/ || true && [ -d utils ] && cp -r utils dist/ || true && cp -r styles dist/ && cp -r pages/*.html dist/pages/ && cp public/sw.js dist/

author: Universidad Tecnológica Santa Catarina
